The namespace provides classes for customizing logging behaviour.

## Classes

| Class | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [ConsoleLogger](./consolelogger) | Writes log messages to the console. |
## Interfaces

| Interface | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [ILogger](./ilogger) | Defines the methods that are used to perform logging. |
